title: RT News - October 28, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Donald Trump announces the successful elimination of ISIL chief Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. The Russian defense ministry, though, has cast doubt on some aspects of the operation while some countries warn that the terror group still poses a threat. Hong Kong is gripped by a 21st consecutive weekend of violent protests. We look at how the unrest is driving money away from that financial hub towards strictly-ruled Singapore. Almost half of Americans surveyed want 'hate speech made illegal' with the majority preferring Facebook, rather than the government, to act as 'censor.'
description: Donald Trump announces the successful elimination of ISIL chief Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi The Russian defense ministry, though, has cast doubt on some aspects of the operation while some countries warn that the terror group still poses a threat
